name: @inkdpixels/commit-analyzer
description: A commit-analyzer plugin for semantic-release which uses the commit guidelines of TYPO3 CMS.

scripts.mocha: find ./src -name '*.spec.js' | xargs istanbul cover -x *.spec.js _mocha -- -R spec --compilers js:babel-register
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha && npm run build && node dist/index.js
